column1: One of the most common fears for people who have had cancer is that it may return.
Cancer can recur in the same spot or in a whole different area of your body.
This is when the cancer occurs in the same spot again.
This means the cancer has grown in the tissues or lymph nodes around the original cancer area.
And there is some evidence that eating a diet rich in fruits and vegetables and low in saturated fats may help reduce the risk of recurrence of some types of cancers.
